articles.content: The United States is currently experiencing a surge in COVID-19 cases as states begin dropping restrictions and allowing businesses to open once again. With people venturing outside and returning to … [+2325 chars]

articles.title: NASA-Designed Perfume Brings The Smell Of Outer Space To Earth - NDTV
articles.description: A fragrance that smells like outer space may soon be made available to the general public, years after it was developed to help astronauts get used to the smell of space.
articles.content:
It took four years to develop 'Eau de Space' - a fragrance that smells like outer space.
